timeline.title: Project roadmap
timeline.subtitle: Explore each stage to understand how we move from concept to a fully operational motorsport complex.

stages.title: Vision
stages.contentText: Define the long-term value, positioning and investment thesis.
stages.contentDetailedText: We establish the project’s purpose, target audiences, and strategic differentiation. This includes defining success metrics, the macro roadmap, and ensuring alignment between stakeholders, legal context, and market reality.

stages.title: Feasibility
stages.contentText: Validate demand, constraints, and the viability of the plan.
stages.contentDetailedText: We analyze location constraints, regulations, environmental considerations, traffic and access, potential partners, and the competitive landscape. The output is a feasibility report with risks, mitigation actions, and an actionable go/no-go.

stages.title: Design
stages.contentText: Translate the vision into an actionable and buildable plan.
stages.contentDetailedText: We define the circuit layout, zones, high performance center requirements, and infrastructure. This phase includes conceptual design, preliminary budgeting, timeline estimation, and the technical basis for homologation planning.

stages.title: Permits
stages.contentText: Secure legal approvals and align stakeholders.
stages.contentDetailedText: We manage permits, municipal requirements, safety standards, and compliance reviews. Stakeholder alignment is critical here: land, engineering, legal, and operational requirements must converge to avoid delays later.

stages.title: Build
stages.contentText: Build the infrastructure and track with controlled milestones.
stages.contentDetailedText: This stage focuses on execution: earthworks, track surface, facilities, utilities, safety systems, and zone development. We track quality and timeline with milestone-based reporting and continuous risk management.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from investors and partners.

items.question: What stage is the project currently in?
items.answer: The project is currently in the feasibility and design phase, with preliminary studies, planning, and stakeholder alignment underway.

items.question: What type of investors is this project aimed at?
items.answer: The project is designed for private investors, investment funds, strategic partners, and organizations interested in long-term infrastructure and motorsport-related assets.

items.question: What is the expected timeline for construction?
items.answer: Construction timelines depend on permits and final approvals, but the estimated execution phase spans multiple controlled milestones over several stages.

items.question: Will the circuit host international competitions?
items.answer: Yes. The project is designed to meet FIA Grade 1 standards, enabling the possibility of hosting international motorsport events.

items.question: How can I receive the full project documentation?
items.answer: You can download the complete project plan from the website or contact us directly for detailed investment documentation.
